main_business: IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) and Electronics Recycling
description: A premier R2v3 & RIOS certified electronics recycling and IT asset disposition company. They buy, sell, trade, liquidate, and destroy end-of-life IT equipment, specializing in data storage equipment like tape media. They offer comprehensive services including secure data destruction, IT asset removal, hardware recycling, third-party maintenance, and cloud storage solutions.
products_services: Sell IT equipment (data tapes, hard drives, servers, networking gear, etc.)
Sort and Settle Service for bulk IT equipment
physical_address: Headquarters | Processing | Distribution: 1736 E. Borchard Ave. Santa Ana, CA 92705, USA
summary:
Big Data Supply Inc. is a global, R2v3 & RIOS certified leader in IT asset disposition and electronics recycling. Founded by CEO Brian Musil, the company provides a full-service, end-of-life solution for IT equipment, handling everything from buying and selling to secure destruction and environmentally responsible recycling. They specialize in data storage media, particularly tape drives and cartridges, but also deal extensively with servers, hard drives, networking equipment, and other data center hardware. Their core mission is to help businesses maximize the value of retired IT assets while ensuring complete data security and environmental compliance.

The company offers a comprehensive suite of services designed for corporate clients. This includes their flagship IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) program, which features secure data wiping or physical destruction with certificates of destruction, complete chain-of-custody tracking, and asset recovery. They also provide data center decommissioning, e-waste recycling, and third-party maintenance services for major OEM hardware brands, offering significant cost savings. Their global footprint includes operational hubs in Santa Ana, California; Amsterdam, Netherlands; and Singapore, allowing them to serve clients in over 100 countries.

Big Data Supply Inc. distinguishes itself through its certifications and ethical standards. Their R2v3 & RIOS certification underscores a commitment to the highest industry practices for environmental management, data security, and worker safety. They emphasize a hassle-free process for clients, often covering shipping and logistics, and provide detailed audits and fair market valuations for used equipment. Whether a client needs to purchase refurbished data tapes, securely destroy sensitive data, or decommission an entire data center, Big Data Supply Inc. positions itself as a one-stop, trustworthy partner.
